title: Lady and the Wolf
description: Walking among humans are beings far different from them, but whose world intertwines with theirs more than it seems.Van Volkov, revered as a god by his own kind, holds one of the four remaining lycans, Konstantin. Bound to protect the shifters for eternity, he has blocked out all forms of emotions he considers weak, putting up a steel wall around him, until a group of rogue shifters attack a nearby campsite and kill some humans. Being the alpha that he is, Van has to safeguard the territory and keep the said attack under wraps, but something makes Konstantin ill at ease—a human child has survived—and, as if by fate, he finds the key to unlocking his hidden humanity.Just when everything has been put under control, at least to Van, the truth is that the story has only begun. He finds out that the child is the reason for his demise and of the shifters that he is supposed to protect.Now, he has but one crucial decision to choose the lady or the wolf.
author: Hendrix  .
